name: Adrenaline
description: This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Affinity Sliding
levels: Increases affinity by 30% for a short time after sliding.

name: Agitator
levels: While active, grants attack +4 and increases affinity by 3%.
While active, grants attack +8 and increases affinity by 6%.
While active, grants attack +12 and increases affinity by 9%.
While active, grants attack +16 and increases affinity by 12%.
While active, grants attack +20 and increases affinity by 15%.

name: Aquatic Expert
levels: Prevents water from slowing movement and improves evasion while in water.
Prevents water from slowing movement and greatly improves evasion while in water.

name: Artillery
levels: Increases power of each attack by 10% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 15%.
Increases power of each attack by 20% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 30%.
Increases power of each attack by 30% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 50%.

name: BBQ Master
levels: Makes it easier to cook well-done steaks.

name: Blast Resistance
levels: Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage.
Greatly delays blastblight and greatly reduces blast damage.

name: Blight Resistance
levels: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 30%.
Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 60%.

name: Blindsider
levels: Increases the success rate of flash effects.

name: Bludgeoner
description: This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Botanist
levels: One extra consumable herb item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, or seed item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, or insect item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, insect or mushroom item per gather.

name: Bow Charge Plus
description: This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Capture Master
description: This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Cliffhanger
levels: Reduces stamina depletion while climbing by 25%.

name: Critical Boost
levels: Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 30%.
Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 35%.
Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 40%.

name: Critical Element
description: This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Critical Status
description: This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Detector
levels: Marks rare sites on the wildlife map.

name: Divine Blessing
levels: While active, reduces damage taken by 15%.
While active, reduces damage taken by 30%.
While active, reduces damage taken by 50%.

name: Dungmaster
levels: Makes slinger dung pods more effective at making monsters run away.

name: Earplugs
levels: Slightly reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
Reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
Nullifies weak monster roars and reduces the effects of strong monster roars.
Nullifies weak and strong monster roars.

name: Effluvial Expert
levels: Nullifies damage from effluvia and reduces damage from acids.

name: Entomologist
levels: Increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.
Greatly increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.
Makes it so corpses will always be left behind.

name: Flinch Free
levels: Prevents standard knockbacks. Tripping is reduced to a knockback instead.

name: Focus
levels: Increases gauge fill rate by 5% and reduces charge times by 5%.
Increases gauge fill rate by 10% and reduces charge times by 10%.
Increases gauge fill rate by 20% and reduces charge times by 20%.

name: Forager's Luck
levels: Increases the likelihood of rare gathering points respawning.

name: Fortify
levels: Increases attack by 10% and defense by 15% with each use.

name: Free Elem/Ammo Up
levels: Draws out 33% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.
Draws out 66% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.
Draws out 100% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.

name: Geologist
levels: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles.
Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles and special item gathering points.
Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles, gathering points, and mining outcrops.

name: Good Luck
description: This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Guard Up
description: This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Guard
levels: Very slightly decreases the impact of attacks.
Slightly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and redcues stamina depletion by 15%.
Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and redcues stamina depletion by 30%.
Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and redcues stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Guts
description: This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Hasten Recovery
description: This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Heroics
levels: While active, increases attack power by 5% and increases defense by 15 points.
While active, increases attack power by 10% and increases defense by 20 points.
While active, increases attack power by 15% and increases defense by 25 points.
While active, increases attack power by 20% and increases defense by 30 points.
While active, increases attack power by 30% and increases defense by 40 points.

name: Horn Maestro
levels: Extends melody effect duration and increases health recovery.

name: Hunger Resistance
levels: Extends the time until your stamina cap decreases by 30%.
Extends the time until your stamina cap decreases by 60%.
Prevents your stamina cap from decreasing.

name: Intimidator
levels: Discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
Highly discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
Prevents monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.

name: Iron Skin
levels: Reduces the duration of Defense Down by 30%.
Reduces the duration of Defense Down by 60%.

name: Latent Power
levels: While active, increases affinity by 10% and reduces stamina depletion by 10%.
While active, increases affinity by 20% and reduces stamina depletion by 10%.
While active, increases affinity by 30% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
While active, increases affinity by 40% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
While active, increases affinity by 50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Master Fisher
levels: Increases the time window for reeling in fish, and makes it easier to catch large fish.

name: Master Gatherer
levels: Speeds up gathering and prevents knockbacks while gathering.

name: Master Mounter
levels: Makes it easier to mount monsters and down mounted monsters.

name: Master's Touch
description: This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Mind's Eye/Ballistics
description: This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Muck Resistance
levels: Reduces limits on movement speed and evasion.

name: Mushroomancer
levels: Lets you digest blue mushrooms and toadstools.
Additionally lets you digest nitroshrooms and parashrooms.
Additionally lets you digest mandragoras, devil's blight, and exciteshrooms.

name: Non-elemental Boost
description: This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Normal Shots
levels: Increases the power of normal ammo and normal arrows.

name: Nullify Wind Pressure
description: This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Palico Rally
levels: Increases Palico attack power and defense by 5%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 10%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 15%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 20%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 25%.

name: Paralysis Resistance
levels: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 30%.
Reduces the duration of paralysis by 60%.

name: Piercing Shots
levels: Increases the power of piercing ammo and Dragon Piercer.

name: Poison Duration Up
description: This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Poison Resistance
levels: Reduces the duration of poison by 30%.
Reduces the duration of poison by 60%.

name: Pro Transporter
levels: Increases movement speed while transporting and reduces downtime on landings.

name: Protective Polish
description: This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Punishing Draw
description: This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Razor Sharp/Spare Shot
description: This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Recovery Speed
levels: Doubles the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Triples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Quadruples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

name: Resuscitate
levels: While active, greatly improves evasion invulnerability time and reduces stamina depletion.

name: Scholar
levels: Speeds up progress on research levels and special investigations.

name: Sleep Resistance
levels: Reduces the duration of sleep by 30%.
Reduces the duration of sleep by 60%.

name: Slinger Capacity
levels: Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo collected from the ground or plants.
In addition, increases the loading capacity for some slinger ammo dropped by monsters.
In addition, increases the loading capacity for all slinger ammo dropped by monsters.

name: Special Ammo Boost
levels: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 10%.
Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 20%.

name: Speed Sharpening
levels: Removes one cycle from the sharpening process.
Removes two cycles from the sharpening process.
Removes three cycles from the sharpening process.

name: Spread/Power Shots
levels: Increases the power of spread ammo and power shot arrows.

name: Stamina Cap Up
description: This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Stealth
levels: Makes it slightly easier for monsters to lose sight of you.
Makes it moderately easier for monsters to lose sight of you.
Makes it much easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

name: Stun Resistance
levels: Reduces the duration of stun by 30%.
Reduces the duration of stun by 60%.

name: Super Recovery
description: This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Tremor Resistance
levels: Nullifies minor ground tremors and reduces the effects of major ground tremors.
Nullifies minor and major ground tremors.

name: Weakness Exploit
levels: Attacks that hit weak spots have 15% increased affinity.
Attacks that hit weak spots have 30% increased affinity.
Attacks that hit weak spots have 50% increased affinity.

name: Wide-Range
levels: Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 33% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with full efficacy.

name: Windproof
levels: Slightly reduces the effects of minor wind pressure.
Reduces the effects of minor wind pressure.
Negates minor wind pressure and reduces the effects of major wind pressure.
Negates minor and major wind pressure.
